SELECT t.id AS teamId, t.shop_id AS shopId, s.cover_img AS shopImg, s.name AS shopName, s.address AS shopAddress, t.start_time AS startTime, t.number AS personNum FROM ( SELECT * FROM team WHERE id IN ( SELECT a.id FROM ( SELECT t.id,t.`number`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team_users WHERE team_id =t.id AND STATUS = 0) AS joinNum FROM team t LEFT JOIN team_users tu ON tu.team_id = t.id GROUP BY t.id ) a WHERE 1=1
and a.number <= (a.joinNum * 2)
and a.number > (a.joinNum * 2)
) AND id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT team_id FROM team_users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND STATUS = 0) ) t LEFT JOIN shop s ON s.id = t.shop_id WHERE t.status = 0 AND t.result = 0 AND t.start_time > NOW()

( SELECT t.id AS teamId, t.shop_id AS shopId, t.owner, s.cover_img AS shopImg, s.name AS shopName, s.address AS shopAddress, t.start_time AS startTime, t.number AS personNum FROM ( SELECT * FROM team WHERE id IN ( SELECT a.id FROM ( SELECT t.id,t.`number`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team_users WHERE team_id =t.id AND STATUS = 0) AS joinNum FROM team t LEFT JOIN team_users tu ON tu.team_id = t.id GROUP BY t.id ) a WHERE 1=1 AND a.number <= (a.joinNum * 2) ) ) t LEFT JOIN shop s ON s.id = t.shop_id WHERE t.status = 0 AND t.result = 0 AND t.start_time > NOW() ORDER BY t.start_time ASC LIMIT 100 ) UNION ( SELECT t.id AS teamId, t.shop_id AS shopId, t.owner, s.cover_img AS shopImg, s.name AS shopName, s.address AS shopAddress, t.start_time AS startTime, t.number AS personNum FROM ( SELECT * FROM team WHERE id IN ( SELECT a.id FROM ( SELECT t.id,t.`number`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team_users WHERE team_id =t.id AND STATUS = 0) AS joinNum FROM team t LEFT JOIN team_users tu ON tu.team_id = t.id GROUP BY t.id ) a WHERE 1=1 AND a.number > (a.joinNum * 2) ) ) t LEFT JOIN shop s ON s.id = t.shop_id WHERE t.status = 0 AND t.result = 0 AND t.start_time > NOW() ORDER BY t.start_time ASC LIMIT 100 )
SELECT tu.team_id AS teamOrInvitingId, u.id AS userId, u.head_pic AS userHeadImg FROM team_users tu LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = tu.user_id WHERE tu.team_id = #{teamId} AND tu.status = 0
SELECT t.number, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team_users WHERE team_id =#{teamId} AND STATUS = 0) AS joinNum FROM team t WHERE t.id = #{teamId}

select t.id,t.start_time as startTime,u.id as userId,u.user_name as userName, u.head_pic as userPic,u.sex,TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,u.birthday,NOW()) AS age, u.profession,u.education,s.name as shopName,s.cover_img as coverImg, st.name as shopTypeName,if(IFNULL(tu.id,0) = 0,0,1) as userJoinStatus FROM team t left join user u on u.id = t.owner left join shop s on s.id = t.shop_id left join shop_type st on st.id = s.shop_type_id left join team_users tu on (tu.team_id = t.id and tu.user_id = #{userId} and tu.status = 0) where t.status = 0 and t.type = 0 and u.status = 0

SELECT s.id AS shopId, s.`cover_img` AS shopCoverImg, s.`name` AS shopName, s.`address` AS shopAddress, s.`price` AS shopPrice, t.id AS teamId FROM team t LEFT JOIN shop s ON s.id = t.shop_id WHERE t.status = 0 AND t.result = 0 AND t.shop_id = #{shopId}

SELECT t.id AS teamId, s.id AS shopId, s.`cover_img` AS shopImg, s.`name` AS shopName, s.`address` AS shopAddress, s.lng, s.lat, s.`price` AS shopPrice, s.`phone` AS shopPhone, t.number AS personNum, t.pay_way AS payWay, t.sex_want AS sexWant, t.start_time AS startTime, ( SELECT sc.status FROM shop_collect sc LEFT JOIN team t ON t.shop_id = sc.shop_id WHERE sc.user_id = #{userId} AND t.id = #{teamId} ) AS shopCollectStatus FROM team t LEFT JOIN shop s ON s.id = t.shop_id WHERE t.id = #{teamId}
